Name: Baby Goat Billy
About the game: Baby Goat Billy is a story-driven quest to save your baby brother. You will have turn-based encounters with unique enemies and you will be able to add new cards to your deck after each victory. You can experiment with different deck builds and find the optimal way of completing the dungeon. If you fail a dungeon run, you will lose your cards but keep your talents, exp and gold. This roguelite element will give you some extra help and you will come back stronger with each dungeon run. Unique Totem Mechanic: Totem cards can summon tribal totems in combat which can greatly enhance your deck by interacting with your cards and actions. Stacking up combos between totems and cards makes your strategy much more powerful. Unravel the Mystery: Explore the beautiful 3D world of goat mythology, speak with different characters, complete side quests and challenges. Acquire powerful skills which will aid you in the mysterious dungeons. As you progress, you will reveal more information about this ancient world and about what happened to your brother. Dynamic Deck Building: Pick your strategy wisely, discover unique cards to add to your deck with each attempt at completing a dungeon. Choose cards that work well together to defeat your foes and receive epic rewards. Overcome puzzles and challenges: Movement obstacles will test your reflexes and provide an additional fun mechanic to the dungeon runs. FOR CONTENT CREATORS: Press kit for your videos or streams :)
